name: Sue Root - Rhythm Action Hybrid
description:
Sue Root is a rhythm game about getting root access to a computer, avoiding the virus protection.

Controls: for movement. You have to move to the beat of the music!

EPILEPSY WARNING: There are some mild flashing lights in the game.

Created for Global Game Jam 2023 (For U of Waterloo): https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/sue-root-7
